Text:
@Anonymous perhaps some more please
btw thanks for these

I made a pretty version of The Sufis ... if your version isn't as nice as mine I'll post mine within 24 hours. Look for it.

Meanwhile, thanks for these. Haven't come across The Perfumed Scorpion before.

These are very fine scans. Good job. 

OCR type is Clearscan, so they look great. Only complaint is they are done in color instead of black and white -- it inflates the file size unnecessarily.

Thanks again.

And I notice you use a Scansnap! Me too!

I recommend processing scanned images with ScanTailor before generating the pdf -- it takes longer, but the results are worth it, in my opinion.
